name: Virus Run (trud)
description:
Made for #LowRezJam2020

Get your virus as far as you can. Avoid walls and white blood cells, they will damage your little hull. You can infect red blood cells, though. They'll spit out a perfect clone of you with full health and refilled boost. Be aware that more infections will mean more white cells.

Points are awarded for the distance you travel in virus form. There will be fewer points the more red cells you infected.

Controls:

  • Left/A : Move left
  • Right/D: Move right
  • Space: Short boost

If you like it, you can vote here:

https://itch.io/jam/lowrezjam-2020
